00033 #include "Mesquite.hpp"

00041 std::string TagVertexMesh::get_name() const
00042 {
00043   std::string result("TagVertexMesh(\"");
00044   result += tagName;
00045   result += "\")";
00046   return result;
00047 }
00048 
00049 void TagVertexMesh::initialize( Mesh* mesh, std::string name, MsqError& err )
00050 {
00051   MeshDecorator::set_mesh( mesh );
00052   tagName = name;
00053 
00054   tagHandle = get_mesh()->tag_get( tagName, err );
00055     // If tag isn't defined yet, we're done for now.
00056   if (err.error_code() == MsqError::TAG_NOT_FOUND) {
00057     err.clear();
00058     return;
00059   } 
00060   else if (MSQ_CHKERR(err))
00061     return;
00062   
00063     // If tag is already defined, make sure it is the correct type.
00064   std::string t_name;
00065   Mesh::TagType type;
00066   unsigned length;
00067   tag_properties( tagHandle, t_name, type, length, err ); 
00068   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00069   if (!(type == Mesh::DOUBLE && length == 3) &&
00070       !(type == Mesh::BYTE && length == 3*sizeof(double)))
00071     MSQ_SETERR(err)(MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS,
00072                     "Tag \"%s\" has invalid type or size.",
00073                     tagName.c_str());
00074  
00075     // If tag is already defined and init was true, reset tag
00076     // values.
00077   haveTagHandle = true;
00078 }
00079 
00080 
00081 double TagVertexMesh::loop_over_mesh( MeshDomainAssoc* mesh_and_domain,
00082                                       const Settings* ,
00083                                       MsqError& err )
00084 {
00085   Mesh* mesh = mesh_and_domain->get_mesh();
00086   if (mesh != get_mesh()) {
00087     MSQ_SETERR(err)("InstructionQueue and TagVertexMesh have different "
00088                     "Mesquite::Mesh instances.  Cannot initialize TagVertexMesh",
00089                     MsqError::INVALID_MESH);
00090     return 0.0;
00091   }
00092   
00093   copy_all_coordinates( err ); MSQ_ERRZERO(err);
00094   return 0.0;
00095 }
00096 
00097 void TagVertexMesh::copy_all_coordinates( MsqError& err )
00098 {
00099   if (!haveTagHandle) {
00100     tagHandle = get_mesh()->tag_create( tagName, Mesh::DOUBLE, 3, 0, err ); 
00101     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00102     haveTagHandle = true;
00103   }
00104 
00105   std::vector<Mesh::VertexHandle> handles;
00106   get_all_vertices( handles, err ); 
00107   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00108   if (handles.empty())
00109     return;
00110   
00111   std::vector<MsqVertex> coords(handles.size());
00112   get_mesh()->vertices_get_coordinates( arrptr(handles), arrptr(coords), handles.size(), err );
00113   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00114   
00115   std::vector<double> data( 3*handles.size() );
00116   std::vector<double>::iterator j = data.begin();
00117   std::vector<MsqVertex>::const_iterator i = coords.begin();
00118   while (i != coords.end()) {
00119     i->get_coordinates( &*j );
00120     ++i;
00121     j += 3;
00122   }
00123   
00124   tag_set_vertex_data( tagHandle, handles.size(), arrptr(handles), arrptr(data), err );
00125   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00126 }
00127 
00128 void TagVertexMesh::check_remove_tag( MsqError& err )
00129 {
00130   if (cleanUpTag && haveTagHandle) {
00131     tag_delete( tagHandle, err );
00132     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00133   }
00134   haveTagHandle = false;
00135 }
00136     
00137 
00138 TagVertexMesh::TagVertexMesh( MsqError& err,
00139                               Mesh* real_mesh,
00140                               bool clean_up,
00141                               std::string name)
00142   : tagHandle(0), haveTagHandle(false), cleanUpTag(clean_up)
00143 {
00144   if (name.size() == 0)
00145     name = "MsqAltCoords";
00146   initialize( real_mesh, name, err ); MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00147 }
00148 
00149 TagVertexMesh::~TagVertexMesh()
00150 {
00151   MsqError err;
00152   check_remove_tag( err );
00153 }
00154 
00155 void TagVertexMesh::set_mesh( Mesh* mesh, MsqError& err )
00156 {
00157   check_remove_tag( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00158   initialize( mesh, tagName, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00159 }
00160 
00161 void TagVertexMesh::set_tag_name( std::string name, MsqError& err )
00162 {
00163   check_remove_tag( err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00164   initialize( get_mesh(), name, err ); MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00165 }
00166 
00167 void TagVertexMesh::clear( MsqError& err )
00168 {
00169   if (haveTagHandle) {
00170     copy_all_coordinates( err );
00171     MSQ_CHKERR(err);
00172   }
00173 }
00174 
00175 
00176 void TagVertexMesh::vertices_get_coordinates( const VertexHandle vert_array[],
00177                                               MsqVertex* coordinates,
00178                                               size_t num_vtx,
00179                                               MsqError &err )
00180 {
00181   if (!num_vtx)
00182     return;
00183   if (!haveTagHandle) {
00184     get_mesh()->vertices_get_coordinates( vert_array, coordinates, num_vtx, err );
00185     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00186   }
00187   else {
00188     std::vector<double> coords( num_vtx * 3 );
00189     get_mesh()->tag_get_vertex_data( tagHandle, num_vtx, vert_array, arrptr(coords), err );
00190     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00191     MsqVertex* coordinates_end = coordinates + num_vtx;
00192     std::vector<double>::const_iterator i = coords.begin();
00193     while (coordinates != coordinates_end) {
00194       coordinates->set( &*i );
00195       i += 3;
00196       ++coordinates;
00197     }
00198   }
00199 }
00200     
00201 void TagVertexMesh::vertex_set_coordinates( VertexHandle vertex,
00202                                             const Vector3D &coordinates,
00203                                             MsqError &err )
00204 {
00205   if (!haveTagHandle)
00206   {
00207     tagHandle = get_mesh()->tag_create( tagName, Mesh::DOUBLE, 3, 0, err ); 
00208     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00209     haveTagHandle = true;
00210     copy_all_coordinates( err );
00211     MSQ_ERRRTN(err);  
00212   }
00213   
00214   get_mesh()->tag_set_vertex_data( tagHandle, 1, &vertex, coordinates.to_array(), err );
00215   MSQ_ERRRTN(err);
00216 }

00222 //***************  Tags  ***********
00223 
00224 TagHandle TagVertexMesh::tag_create( const std::string& tag_name,
00225                                      TagType type, unsigned length,
00226                                      const void* default_value,
00227                                      MsqError &err)
00228 {
00229     // Don't allow access to internal tag for vertex coordinates.
00230     // This prevents accidental layering of multiple instances of
00231     // TagVertexMesh with the same tag name.
00232   if (tag_name == tagName) {
00233     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to access internal tag data using tag interface.",
00234                     MsqError::TAG_ALREADY_EXISTS);
00235     return (TagHandle)0;
00236   }
00237   
00238   return get_mesh()->tag_create( tag_name, type, length, default_value, err );
00239 }
00240 
00241 TagHandle TagVertexMesh::tag_get( const std::string& name, MsqError& err )
00242 {
00243     // Don't allow access to internal tag for vertex coordinates.
00244     // This prevents accidental layering of multiple instances of
00245     // TagVertexMesh with the same tag name.
00246   if (name == tagName) {
00247     MSQ_SETERR(err)("Attempt to access internal tag data using tag interface.",
00248                     MsqError::INVALID_ARG);
00249     return (TagHandle)0;
00250   }
00251   
00252   return get_mesh()->tag_get( name, err );
00253 }
00254     
00255 void TagVertexMesh::release()
00256 {
00257   MsqError err;
00258   clear(err);
00259   check_remove_tag(err);
00260   haveTagHandle = false;
00261   MeshDecorator::release();
00262 }

00265                                       const Settings* ,
00266                                       MsqError&  )
00267 {
00268 }
